titleStmt.title: The heads of reasons, for vvhich a generall councell of Protestants ought to be called together in England. Published by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P. for Nicolas Bourne and are to be sold at his shop at the South entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
